name: TeleportTriggerBox
author: 𝕽𝖔𝖚𝖘𝖙𝖆𝖓
description: Spawns a customizable trigger zone that teleports players to a configurable X,Y,Z destination on entry. Creates a rigidbody with a geometry collider set as a trigger, and uses onTriggerEnter to call player.teleport. The box mesh can be toggled visible or hidden and scaled along each axis via props.
